name: Offroad Radio Taxi Service Pro
description:
Get behind the wheel of a cart transporter Real Shopping Mall Transporter taxi to start a joyful journey as a real car driver on the offroad tracks. Experience the extreme madness on the shopping mall centers while driving a heavy shopping mall taxi in extreme shopping mall taxi tracks. Prove your shopping mall car driving skills by safely transporting the passengers from one place of park center to another place with multiple locations without getting late. So, get on the board, buckle up and take control of real shopping mall car transporter as a real urban city car transporter. You can enjoy simulating the real shopping mall taxi transporter vehicles with three different control modes to have a realistic experience of driving. Either controls a steering wheel while enjoying the realistic interior of the real shopping mall car transporter simulator. You can use the tilt or button controller modes to drive with ease with third person camera perspective.


Experience the best high quality graphics with astonishing animations with realistic audio effects. You never know when a beautiful location suddenly appears before you while roaming around real shopping mall car transporter. The amazing weather effects, high-poly textures and the real 3D models will surely going to keep you on you entertained in the whole game. Take your driving skills miles beyond the limits while experiencing multiple control modes. Pick the passengers from one point to another point in the time to become the furious driver. Just park the real shopping mall car transporter on the marked location and once all the passengers are boarded, drive them to the destination as fast as you can. So, buckle up for the intense driving action with shopping mall and be the best transporter driver ever.


Unlock your favorite and most powerful luxury real shopping mall cars with high accuracy and turbo engines. There are a lot of modern shopping mall cars available to drive in this free driving game. Just select your favorite one from the game garage and have an adventurous offroad journey.



Game Features:

• Beautiful Park Environment with High-Quality 3D Graphics.
• Realistic and Physics-Based Simulation
• Smooth Gameplay with User Friendly
• A Wide Variety of Luxury Real Shopping Mall Transport Cars
• Three Different Control Modes I.E. Tilt, Steering and Button
Download It Now For Free!
